title: 3150 IP!
body: what champion should i buy for 3150 IP and why?

replies.body: I took a look at your account and it looks like you play a ton of Thresh. I'd say if you're looking for a new champion to play, it might be a good idea to look at new support champions to play, unless you were looking to play other roles. ^.^
well ye, i like thresh really a lot, because of hes kit, and hes very powerful for support, but on other account i main Yasuo  (lvl 7 and almost 100 k xp)
